name: Country Club Prep
tag_list: like-preppy-clothing, preppy-ties, ties, polo-shirts, collared-shirts, button-down-shirts, seersucker, madras, linen, southern-proper, elizabeth-mckay
overview:
Country Club Prep is an e-commerce retailer focused on selling preppy clothing and accessories.

It offers the best products from the best preppy designers, including Barbara Gerwit, Bird Dog Bay, Castaway Clothing, Collared Greens, Eliza B., Elizabeth McKay, Gretchen Scott Designs, Harding-Lane, Jack Donnelly Khakis, Johnnie-O, Just Madras, Kiel James Patrick, Knot Clothing Co., Krass & Funnell, Lemon & Line, Liquid Flow, Marine Layer, Perlis, Salmon Cove, Smathers & Branson, Southern Marsh, Southern Proper, Starboard Clothing, Strong Boalt, Tugs, and Unruly Heir. More designers are being added on a weekly basis.

Country Club Prep also offers a membership rewards program that includes benefits such as free shipping and returns on every purchase, exclusive access to products, and exclusive deals, among other benefits.

products.name: Barbara Gerwit, Bird Dog Bay, Castaway Clothing, Collared Greens, Eliza B., Elizabeth McKay, Gretchen Scott Designs, Harding-Lane, Jack Donnelly Khakis, Johnnie-O, Just Madras, Kiel James Patrick, Knot Clothing Co., Krass & Funnell, Lemon & Line, Liquid F
